code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Typography,Grid,Card,CardContent,CardActions,Button}from'@mui/material';import{getItineraries}from'../services/itineraryService';import{format}from'date-fns';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ItineraryList(){const[itineraries,setItineraries]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const loadItineraries=()=>{const data=getItineraries();setItineraries(data);};loadItineraries();},[]);const handleViewDetails=id=>{navigate(`/itinerary/${id}`);};const handleEdit=id=>{navigate(`/edit/${id}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",sx:{mt:4,mb:4},children:"My Itineraries"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:itineraries.map(itinerary=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",component:"h2",children:itinerary.destination}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{color:"textSecondary",children:[format(new Date(itinerary.startDate),'MMM dd, yyyy')," -",format(new Date(itinerary.endDate),'MMM dd, yyyy')]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",color:"primary",onClick:()=>handleViewDetails(itinerary.id),children:"View Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",color:"secondary",onClick:()=>handleEdit(itinerary.id),children:"Edit"})]})]})},itinerary.id))})]});}export default ItineraryList;
